update_inr_comp_inr:
@[simp]
theorem update_inr_comp_inr [decidable_eq β] [decidable_eq (Sum α β)] {f : Sum α β → γ} {i : β} {x : γ} :
    update f (inr i) x ∘ inr = update (f ∘ inr) i x :=
  update_comp_eq_of_injective _ inr_injective _ _
#align update_inr_comp_inr update_inr_comp_inr
update_inr_comp_inl:
@[simp]
theorem update_inr_comp_inl [decidable_eq (Sum α β)] {f : Sum α β → γ} {i : β} {x : γ} :
    update f (inr i) x ∘ inl = f ∘ inl :=
  update_comp_eq_of_forall_ne _ _ fun _ => inl_ne_inr
#align update_inr_comp_inl update_inr_comp_inl
update_inr_apply_inr:
@[simp]
theorem update_inr_apply_inr [decidable_eq β] [decidable_eq (Sum α β)] {f : Sum α β → γ} {i j : β} {x : γ} :
    update f (inr i) x (inr j) = update (f ∘ inr) i x j := by rw [← update_inr_comp_inr]
#align update_inr_apply_inr update_inr_apply_inr
update_inr_apply_inl:
@[simp]
theorem update_inr_apply_inl [decidable_eq (Sum α β)] {f : Sum α β → γ} {i : α} {j : β} {x : γ} :
    update f (inr j) x (inl i) = f (inl i) :=
  function.update_noteq inl_ne_inr _ _
#align update_inr_apply_inl update_inr_apply_inl
update_inl_comp_inr:
@[simp]
theorem update_inl_comp_inr [decidable_eq (Sum α β)] {f : Sum α β → γ} {i : α} {x : γ} :
    update f (inl i) x ∘ inr = f ∘ inr :=
  update_comp_eq_of_forall_ne _ _ fun _ => inr_ne_inl
#align update_inl_comp_inr update_inl_comp_inr
update_inl_comp_inl:
@[simp]
theorem update_inl_comp_inl [decidable_eq α] [decidable_eq (Sum α β)] {f : Sum α β → γ} {i : α} {x : γ} :
    update f (inl i) x ∘ inl = update (f ∘ inl) i x :=
  update_comp_eq_of_injective _ inl_injective _ _
#align update_inl_comp_inl update_inl_comp_inl
update_inl_apply_inr:
@[simp]
theorem update_inl_apply_inr [decidable_eq (Sum α β)] {f : Sum α β → γ} {i : α} {j : β} {x : γ} :
    update f (inl i) x (inr j) = f (inr j) :=
  function.update_noteq inr_ne_inl _ _
#align update_inl_apply_inr update_inl_apply_inr
update_inl_apply_inl:
@[simp]
theorem update_inl_apply_inl [decidable_eq α] [decidable_eq (Sum α β)] {f : Sum α β → γ} {i j : α} {x : γ} :
    update f (inl i) x (inl j) = update (f ∘ inl) i x j := by rw [← update_inl_comp_inl]
#align update_inl_apply_inl update_inl_apply_inl
update_elim_inr:
@[simp]
theorem update_elim_inr [decidable_eq β] [decidable_eq (Sum α β)] {f : α → γ} {g : β → γ} {i : β} {x : γ} :
    update (sum.elim f g) (inr i) x = sum.elim f (update g i x) :=
  update_eq_iff.2 ⟨by simp, by simp (config := { contextual := true })⟩
#align update_elim_inr update_elim_inr
update_elim_inl:
@[simp]
theorem update_elim_inl [decidable_eq α] [decidable_eq (Sum α β)] {f : α → γ} {g : β → γ} {i : α} {x : γ} :
    update (sum.elim f g) (inl i) x = sum.elim (update f i x) g :=
  update_eq_iff.2 ⟨by simp, by simp (config := { contextual := true })⟩
#align update_elim_inl update_elim_inl
swap_swap_eq:
@[simp]
theorem swap_swap_eq : swap ∘ swap = @id (Sum α β) :=
  funext <| swap_swap
#align swap_swap_eq swap_swap_eq
swap_swap:
@[simp]
theorem swap_swap (x : Sum α β) : swap (swap x) = x := by cases x <;> rfl
#align swap_swap swap_swap
swap_right_inverse:
@[simp]
theorem swap_right_inverse : function.right_inverse (@swap α β) swap :=
  swap_swap
#align swap_right_inverse swap_right_inverse
swap_left_inverse:
@[simp]
theorem swap_left_inverse : function.left_inverse (@swap α β) swap :=
  swap_swap
#align swap_left_inverse swap_left_inverse
swap_inr:
@[simp]
theorem swap_inr (x : β) : swap (inr x : Sum α β) = inl x :=
  rfl
#align swap_inr swap_inr
swap_inl:
@[simp]
theorem swap_inl (x : α) : swap (inl x : Sum α β) = inr x :=
  rfl
#align swap_inl swap_inl
swap:
protected theorem lift_rel.swap (h : lift_rel r s x y) : lift_rel s r x.swap y.swap :=
  by
  cases h
  exacts[lift_rel.inr ‹_›, lift_rel.inl ‹_›]
#align lift_rel.swap lift_rel.swap
sum_map:
theorem surjective.sum_map {f : α → β} {g : α' → β'} (hf : surjective f) (hg : surjective g) : surjective (sum.map f g)
  | inl y =>
    let ⟨x, hx⟩ := hf y
    ⟨inl x, congr_arg inl hx⟩
  | inr y =>
    let ⟨x, hx⟩ := hg y
    ⟨inr x, congr_arg inr hx⟩
#align surjective.sum_map surjective.sum_map
sum_elim:
theorem injective.sum_elim {f : α → γ} {g : β → γ} (hf : injective f) (hg : injective g) (hfg : ∀ a b, f a ≠ g b) :
    injective (sum.elim f g)
  | inl x, inl y, h => congr_arg inl <| hf h
  | inl x, inr y, h => (hfg x y h).elim
  | inr x, inl y, h => (hfg y x h.symm).elim
  | inr x, inr y, h => congr_arg inr <| hg h
#align injective.sum_elim injective.sum_elim
not_lift_rel_inr_inl:
@[simp]
theorem not_lift_rel_inr_inl : ¬lift_rel r s (inr b) (inl c) :=
  fun.
#align not_lift_rel_inr_inl not_lift_rel_inr_inl
not_lift_rel_inl_inr:
@[simp]
theorem not_lift_rel_inl_inr : ¬lift_rel r s (inl a) (inr d) :=
  fun.
#align not_lift_rel_inl_inr not_lift_rel_inl_inr
not_is_right:
theorem not_is_right : ¬x.is_right ↔ x.is_left := by simp
#align not_is_right not_is_right
not_is_left:
theorem not_is_left : ¬x.is_left ↔ x.is_right := by simp
#align not_is_left not_is_left
mono_right:
theorem lex.mono_right (hs : ∀ a b, s₁ a b → s₂ a b) (h : lex r s₁ x y) : lex r s₂ x y :=
  h.mono (fun _ _ => id) hs
#align lex.mono_right lex.mono_right
mono_left:
theorem lex.mono_left (hr : ∀ a b, r₁ a b → r₂ a b) (h : lex r₁ s x y) : lex r₂ s x y :=
  h.mono hr fun _ _ => id
#align lex.mono_left lex.mono_left
mono:
theorem lex.mono (hr : ∀ a b, r₁ a b → r₂ a b) (hs : ∀ a b, s₁ a b → s₂ a b) (h : lex r₁ s₁ x y) : lex r₂ s₂ x y :=
  by
  cases h
  exacts[lex.inl (hr _ _ ‹_›), lex.inr (hs _ _ ‹_›), lex.sep _ _]
#align lex.mono lex.mono
map_map:
@[simp]
theorem map_map {α'' β''} (f' : α' → α'') (g' : β' → β'') (f : α → α') (g : β → β') :
    ∀ x : Sum α β, (x.map f g).map f' g' = x.map (f' ∘ f) (g' ∘ g)
  | inl a => rfl
  | inr b => rfl
#align map_map map_map
map_inr:
@[simp]
theorem map_inr (f : α → α') (g : β → β') (x : β) : (inr x).map f g = inr (g x) :=
  rfl
#align map_inr map_inr
map_inl:
@[simp]
theorem map_inl (f : α → α') (g : β → β') (x : α) : (inl x).map f g = inl (f x) :=
  rfl
#align map_inl map_inl
map_id_id:
@[simp]
theorem map_id_id (α β) : sum.map (@id α) (@id β) = id :=
  funext fun x => sum.rec_on x (fun _ => rfl) fun _ => rfl
#align map_id_id map_id_id
map_comp_map:
@[simp]
theorem map_comp_map {α'' β''} (f' : α' → α'') (g' : β' → β'') (f : α → α') (g : β → β') :
    sum.map f' g' ∘ sum.map f g = sum.map (f' ∘ f) (g' ∘ g) :=
  funext <| map_map f' g' f g
#align map_comp_map map_comp_map
lift_rel_swap_iff:
@[simp]
theorem lift_rel_swap_iff : lift_rel s r x.swap y.swap ↔ lift_rel r s x y :=
  ⟨fun h => by
    rw [← swap_swap x, ← swap_swap y]
    exact h.swap, lift_rel.swap⟩
#align lift_rel_swap_iff lift_rel_swap_iff
lift_rel_subrelation_lex:
theorem lift_rel_subrelation_lex : subrelation (lift_rel r s) (lex r s) := fun a b => lift_rel.lex
#align lift_rel_subrelation_lex lift_rel_subrelation_lex
lift_rel_inr_inr:
@[simp]
theorem lift_rel_inr_inr : lift_rel r s (inr b) (inr d) ↔ s b d :=
  ⟨fun h => by
    cases h
    assumption, lift_rel.inr⟩
#align lift_rel_inr_inr lift_rel_inr_inr
lift_rel_inl_inl:
@[simp]
theorem lift_rel_inl_inl : lift_rel r s (inl a) (inl c) ↔ r a c :=
  ⟨fun h => by
    cases h
    assumption, lift_rel.inl⟩
#align lift_rel_inl_inl lift_rel_inl_inl
lex_wf:
theorem lex_wf (ha : well_founded r) (hb : well_founded s) : well_founded (lex r s) :=
  have aca : ∀ a, acc (lex r s) (inl a) := fun a => lex_acc_inl (ha.apply a)
  ⟨fun x => sum.rec_on x aca fun b => lex_acc_inr aca (hb.apply b)⟩
#align lex_wf lex_wf
lex_inr_inr:
@[simp]
theorem lex_inr_inr : lex r s (inr b₁) (inr b₂) ↔ s b₁ b₂ :=
  ⟨fun h => by
    cases h
    assumption, Lex.inr⟩
#align lex_inr_inr lex_inr_inr
lex_inr_inl:
@[simp]
theorem lex_inr_inl : ¬lex r s (inr b) (inl a) :=
  fun.
#align lex_inr_inl lex_inr_inl
lex_inl_inl:
@[simp]
theorem lex_inl_inl : lex r s (inl a₁) (inl a₂) ↔ r a₁ a₂ :=
  ⟨fun h => by
    cases h
    assumption, Lex.inl⟩
#align lex_inl_inl lex_inl_inl
lex_acc_inr:
theorem lex_acc_inr (aca : ∀ a, acc (lex r s) (inl a)) {b} (acb : acc s b) : acc (lex r s) (inr b) :=
  by
  induction' acb with b H IH
  constructor; intro y h
  cases' h with _ _ _ b' _ h' a
  · exact IH _ h'
  · exact aca _
#align lex_acc_inr lex_acc_inr
lex_acc_inl:
theorem lex_acc_inl {a} (aca : acc r a) : acc (lex r s) (inl a) :=
  by
  induction' aca with a H IH
  constructor; intro y h
  cases' h with a' _ h'
  exact IH _ h'
#align lex_acc_inl lex_acc_inl
lex:
protected theorem lift_rel.lex {a b : Sum α β} (h : lift_rel r s a b) : lex r s a b :=
  by
  cases h
  exacts[lex.inl ‹_›, lex.inr ‹_›]
#align lift_rel.lex lift_rel.lex
is_right_swap:
@[simp]
theorem is_right_swap (x : Sum α β) : x.swap.is_right = x.is_left := by cases x <;> rfl
#align is_right_swap is_right_swap
is_right_map:
@[simp]
theorem is_right_map (f : α → β) (g : γ → δ) (x : Sum α γ) : is_right (x.map f g) = is_right x := by cases x <;> rfl
#align is_right_map is_right_map
is_right_iff:
theorem is_right_iff : x.is_right ↔ ∃ y, x = sum.inr y := by cases x <;> simp
#align is_right_iff is_right_iff
is_right_eq_ff:
@[simp]
theorem is_right_eq_ff : x.is_right = ff ↔ x.is_left := by cases x <;> simp
#align is_right_eq_ff is_right_eq_ff
is_left_swap:
@[simp]
theorem is_left_swap (x : Sum α β) : x.swap.is_left = x.is_right := by cases x <;> rfl
#align is_left_swap is_left_swap
is_left_map:
@[simp]
theorem is_left_map (f : α → β) (g : γ → δ) (x : Sum α γ) : is_left (x.map f g) = is_left x := by cases x <;> rfl
#align is_left_map is_left_map
is_left_iff:
theorem is_left_iff : x.is_left ↔ ∃ y, x = sum.inl y := by cases x <;> simp
#align is_left_iff is_left_iff
is_left_eq_ff:
@[simp]
theorem is_left_eq_ff : x.is_left = ff ↔ x.is_right := by cases x <;> simp
#align is_left_eq_ff is_left_eq_ff
inr_ne_inl:
theorem inr_ne_inl {a : α} {b : β} : inr b ≠ inl a :=
  fun.
#align inr_ne_inl inr_ne_inl
inr_injective:
theorem inr_injective : function.injective (inr : β → Sum α β) := fun x y => inr.inj
#align inr_injective inr_injective
inl_ne_inr:
theorem inl_ne_inr {a : α} {b : β} : inl a ≠ inr b :=
  fun.
#align inl_ne_inr inl_ne_inr
inl_injective:
theorem inl_injective : function.injective (inl : α → Sum α β) := fun x y => inl.inj
#align inl_injective inl_injective
inj_iff:
theorem inr.inj_iff {a b} : (inr a : Sum α β) = inr b ↔ a = b :=
  ⟨inr.inj, congr_arg _⟩
#align inr.inj_iff inr.inj_iff
get_right_swap:
@[simp]
theorem get_right_swap (x : Sum α β) : x.swap.get_right = x.get_left := by cases x <;> rfl
#align get_right_swap get_right_swap
get_right_map:
@[simp]
theorem get_right_map (f : α → β) (g : γ → δ) (x : Sum α γ) : (x.map f g).get_right = x.get_right.map g := by
  cases x <;> rfl
#align get_right_map get_right_map
get_right_eq_some_iff:
@[simp]
theorem get_right_eq_some_iff {b} : x.get_right = some b ↔ x = inr b := by cases x <;> simp only [get_right]
#align get_right_eq_some_iff get_right_eq_some_iff
get_right_eq_none_iff:
@[simp]
theorem get_right_eq_none_iff : x.get_right = none ↔ x.is_left := by
  cases x <;> simp only [get_right, is_left, Bool.coe_sort_true, Bool.coe_sort_false, eq_self_iff_true]
#align get_right_eq_none_iff get_right_eq_none_iff
get_left_swap:
@[simp]
theorem get_left_swap (x : Sum α β) : x.swap.get_left = x.get_right := by cases x <;> rfl
#align get_left_swap get_left_swap
get_left_map:
@[simp]
theorem get_left_map (f : α → β) (g : γ → δ) (x : Sum α γ) : (x.map f g).get_left = x.get_left.map f := by
  cases x <;> rfl
#align get_left_map get_left_map
get_left_eq_some_iff:
@[simp]
theorem get_left_eq_some_iff {a} : x.get_left = some a ↔ x = inl a := by cases x <;> simp only [get_left]
#align get_left_eq_some_iff get_left_eq_some_iff
get_left_eq_none_iff:
@[simp]
theorem get_left_eq_none_iff : x.get_left = none ↔ x.is_right := by
  cases x <;> simp only [get_left, is_right, Bool.coe_sort_true, Bool.coe_sort_false, eq_self_iff_true]
#align get_left_eq_none_iff get_left_eq_none_iff
forall:

@[simp]
theorem forall {p : Sum α β → Prop} : (∀ x, p x) ↔ (∀ a, p (inl a)) ∧ ∀ b, p (inr b) :=
  ⟨fun h => ⟨fun a => h _, fun b => h _⟩, fun ⟨h₁, h₂⟩ => sum.rec h₁ h₂⟩
#align forall forall
exists:
@[simp]
theorem exists {p : Sum α β → Prop} : (∃ x, p x) ↔ (∃ a, p (inl a)) ∨ ∃ b, p (inr b) :=
  ⟨fun h =>
    match h with
    | ⟨inl a, h⟩ => or.inl ⟨a, h⟩
    | ⟨inr b, h⟩ => or.inr ⟨b, h⟩,
    fun h =>
    match h with
    | or.inl ⟨a, h⟩ => ⟨inl a, h⟩
    | or.inr ⟨b, h⟩ => ⟨inr b, h⟩⟩
#align exists exists
elim_update_right:
theorem elim_update_right [decidable_eq α] [decidable_eq β] (f : α → γ) (g : β → γ) (i : β) (c : γ) :
    sum.elim f (function.update g i c) = function.update (sum.elim f g) (inr i) c :=
  by
  ext x; cases x
  · simp
  · by_cases h : x = i
    · subst h
      simp
    · simp [h]
#align elim_update_right elim_update_right
elim_update_left:
theorem elim_update_left [decidable_eq α] [decidable_eq β] (f : α → γ) (g : β → γ) (i : α) (c : γ) :
    sum.elim (function.update f i c) g = function.update (sum.elim f g) (inl i) c :=
  by
  ext x; cases x
  · by_cases h : x = i
    · subst h
      simp
    · simp [h]
  · simp
#align elim_update_left elim_update_left
elim_map:
theorem elim_map {α β γ δ ε : Sort _} {f₁ : α → β} {f₂ : β → ε} {g₁ : γ → δ} {g₂ : δ → ε} {x} :
    sum.elim f₂ g₂ (sum.map f₁ g₁ x) = sum.elim (f₂ ∘ f₁) (g₂ ∘ g₁) x := by cases x <;> rfl
#align elim_map elim_map
elim_lam_const_lam_const:
@[simp]
theorem elim_lam_const_lam_const (c : γ) : (sum.elim (fun _ : α => c) fun _ : β => c) = fun _ => c :=
  sum.elim_const_const c
#align elim_lam_const_lam_const elim_lam_const_lam_const
elim_inr:
@[simp]
theorem elim_inr {α β γ : Sort _} (f : α → γ) (g : β → γ) (x : β) : sum.elim f g (inr x) = g x :=
  rfl
#align elim_inr elim_inr
elim_inl_inr:
@[simp]
theorem elim_inl_inr {α β : Sort _} : @sum.elim α β _ inl inr = id :=
  funext fun x => sum.cases_on x (fun _ => rfl) fun _ => rfl
#align elim_inl_inr elim_inl_inr
elim_inl:
@[simp]
theorem elim_inl {α β γ : Sort _} (f : α → γ) (g : β → γ) (x : α) : sum.elim f g (inl x) = f x :=
  rfl
#align elim_inl elim_inl
elim_const_const:
theorem elim_const_const (c : γ) : sum.elim (const _ c : α → γ) (const _ c : β → γ) = const _ c :=
  by
  ext x
  cases x <;> rfl
#align elim_const_const elim_const_const
elim_comp_map:
theorem elim_comp_map {α β γ δ ε : Sort _} {f₁ : α → β} {f₂ : β → ε} {g₁ : γ → δ} {g₂ : δ → ε} :
    sum.elim f₂ g₂ ∘ sum.map f₁ g₁ = sum.elim (f₂ ∘ f₁) (g₂ ∘ g₁) :=
  funext fun _ => elim_map
#align elim_comp_map elim_comp_map
elim_comp_inr:
@[simp]
theorem elim_comp_inr {α β γ : Sort _} (f : α → γ) (g : β → γ) : sum.elim f g ∘ inr = g :=
  rfl
#align elim_comp_inr elim_comp_inr
elim_comp_inl_inr:
@[simp]
theorem elim_comp_inl_inr {α β γ : Sort _} (f : Sum α β → γ) : sum.elim (f ∘ inl) (f ∘ inr) = f :=
  funext fun x => sum.cases_on x (fun _ => rfl) fun _ => rfl
#align elim_comp_inl_inr elim_comp_inl_inr
elim_comp_inl:
@[simp]
theorem elim_comp_inl {α β γ : Sort _} (f : α → γ) (g : β → γ) : sum.elim f g ∘ inl = f :=
  rfl
#align elim_comp_inl elim_comp_inl
comp_elim:
theorem comp_elim {α β γ δ : Sort _} (f : γ → δ) (g : α → γ) (h : β → γ) :
    f ∘ sum.elim g h = sum.elim (f ∘ g) (f ∘ h) :=
  funext fun x => sum.cases_on x (fun _ => rfl) fun _ => rfl
#align comp_elim comp_elim
bnot_is_right:
@[simp]
theorem bnot_is_right (x : Sum α β) : not x.is_right = x.is_left := by cases x <;> rfl
#align bnot_is_right bnot_is_right
bnot_is_left:
@[simp]
theorem bnot_is_left (x : Sum α β) : not x.is_left = x.is_right := by cases x <;> rfl
#align bnot_is_left bnot_is_left
